template.p: This setup is for Clothing and Boutique retail shops which encompasses the creation, distribution, and retail of clothing and fashion accessories to a specific segment of people.

li.p: Point of Sale App: Speed up checkout with an intuitive interface that handles multiple variants, returns, and customer loyalty programs seamlessly.
Inventory App: Manage complex product matrices (sizes, colors, fits) and use barcode/RFID scanning for rapid stock counts and transfers.
eCommerce App: Create a stunning online storefront to sell your fashion collections globally, offering features like "shop by look" or dynamic filters.
Sales App: Handle wholesale orders or B2B contracts with ease, using variant grids to quickly enter large orders for different sizes.
Purchase App: Automate replenishment based on seasonal demand, ensuring you have the right mix of sizes and styles in stock.
Website App: Design a visually appealing brand site that showcases your latest arrivals, lookbooks, and store locations.
Email Marketing App: Engage your customers with personalized newsletters about new collections, sales, and exclusive style advice.

template.h2: Flow 2: POS with Barcode and BOGO offer.

ul.li: Add the Barcode number in the Product Master and take a print to scan them during the POS session.
You can also search the Barcode number of that product from the POS session to recognise that product.

template.blockquote:
BOGO Offer (Buy one Get one Free)
Promotions are popular among retailers because they can increase sales of the products being promoted. Plus, it will attract attention to other items in the store, which is great when you need to move dead stock or boost sales.

ul.li: Create a POS order through POS Application
Scan ‚ÄúHIGHJEAN001‚Äù Barcode number from the search bar and select the ‚ÄúHigh Waist Jeans‚Äù product and customer.
Click on the reward button and the system will display the "Buy 1 Get 1 Free Product T-Shirt (Purple)‚Äù. You can see the free product is added along in the point of sale order.
Continue the payment Process further with any of the payment methods and validate.

template.blockquote: There is a Promotion Program created in which the reward for Free Product has been defined.
template.p: Loyalty points are given to customer on their purchase & later on the customer can redeem discount in exchange of loyalty points

Add any ‚ÄúJumpsuit‚Äù from the western wear category.
On each order the customer will earn 5 points and that will be added into their balance and when the customer reaches the points up to 200 then in exchange that the customer can claim 5 % discount.

template.p: Nowadays, it has become almost a practice for companies to offer at least one or more seasonal discounts to customers at any particular time of the year like: New Year's Eve discount, winter sale, Christmas sale, summer sale, etc.
